{"cpp.json":"{
    "cpp snippets":
    {
        "prefix" : "basic",
                   "body" : [
                       "#include<iostream>",
                       "using namespace std;",
                       "int main()",
                       "{",
                       "    return 0;",
                       "}"
  
                   ],
                            "description" : "c++ basic"
    },
    "Display all elements of array":{
        "prefix" : "printarray",
                   "body" : [
                    "for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {",
                        "cout << arr[i];"
  
                   ],
                            "description" : "print array"
    },
    "Sort element code":{
        "prefix" : "sont",
                   "body" : [
                    "int Smallest(int a[],int n,int i){",
                        "int  min = i;",
                         "for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {",
                             "if (a[min] > a[j]) {",
                                 "min = j;",
                             "}",
                     "}",
                     "return min;",
                 "}",
                 "int* selectionSort(int arr[], int n){",
                     "for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {",
                     "int min=Smallest(arr, n,i);",
                     "if (min != i) {",
                         "swap(arr[min], arr[i]);",
                         "}",
                         "}",
                     "return arr;",
                 "}",
                 "int* Bubble(int arr[],int n){",
                      "for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {",
                         "for (int j = 0; j < n - 1; j++) {",
                             "if (arr[j + 1] < arr[j]) {",
                                "swap(arr[j],arr[j+1]);",
                                "}",
                            "}",
                     "}",
                     "return arr;",
                "}",
                 "int* Insertion(int arr[],int n){",
                      "for (int i = 0; i < n-1 ;i++) {",
                     "for (int j = i+1; j >0; j--) {",
                         "if(arr[j]<arr[j-1]){",
                             "swap(arr[j],arr[j-1]);",
                         "}else{break;}",
                     "}",
                  "}",
                      "return arr;",
                    "}",
  
                   ],
                            "description" : "sont the array"
    },

}
"}
